triggers.name: Default
triggers.formula: ((abs(Open - High) / Open)*100 >= 0.333 or (abs(Open - Low) / Open)*100 >= 0.333) and (4*abs(Open-Close)<abs(High-Low))

triggers.name: Bullish Marubozu
triggers.formula: (Close[-2] > Open[-2]) and (High[-2] - Close[-2] <= 0.05*(Close[-2]-Open[-2])) and (Open[-2] - Low[-2] <= 0.05*(Close[-2]-Open[-2])) and (Close[-1] > Open[-1]) and (Close[-1] > High[-2])

triggers.name: Bearish Marubozu
triggers.formula: (Open[-2] > Close[-2]) and (High[-2] - Open[-2] <= 0.05*(Open[-2]-Close[-2])) and (Close[-2] - Low[-2] <= 0.05*(Open[-2]-Close[-2])) and (Close[-1] < Open[-1]) and (Close[-1] < Low[-2])

triggers.name: Doji
triggers.formula: abs(Close - Open) <= 0.2*(High - Low)

triggers.name: Hammer
triggers.formula: (min(Open[-2], Close[-2]) - Low[-2] >= 1.5*abs(Close[-2]-Open[-2])) and (High[-2]-max(Open[-2],Close[-2]) <= 1.5*abs(Close[-2]-Open[-2])) and (Close[-1]>Open[-1]) and (Close[-1]>High[-2])

triggers.name: Inverted Hammer
triggers.formula: (High[-2]-max(Open[-2],Close[-2]) >= 1.5*abs(Close[-2]-Open[-2])) and (min(Open[-2], Close[-2])-Low[-2] <= 1.5*abs(Close[-2]-Open[-2])) and (Close[-1]>Open[-1]) and (Close[-1]>High[-2])

triggers.name: Bullish Engulfing
triggers.formula: (Close[-3] < Open[-3]) and (Close[-2] > Open[-2]) and (Open[-2] <= Close[-3]) and (Close[-2] >= Open[-3]) and (Close[-1] > Open[-1]) and (Close[-1] > High[-2])

triggers.name: Bearish Engulfing
triggers.formula: (Close[-3] > Open[-3]) and (Close[-2] < Open[-2]) and (Open[-2] >= Close[-3]) and (Close[-2] <= Open[-3]) and (Close[-1] < Open[-1]) and (Close[-1] < Low[-2])

triggers.name: Morning Star
triggers.formula: (Close[-4] < Open[-4]) and (abs(Close[-3]-Open[-3]) < 0.5*abs(Open[-4]-Close[-4])) and (Close[-3] < Close[-4]) and (Close[-2] > Open[-2]) and (Close[-2] > (Open[-4]+Close[-4])/2) and (Close[-1] > Open[-1]) and (Close[-1] > High[-2])

triggers.name: Evening Star
triggers.formula: (Close[-4] > Open[-4]) and (abs(Close[-3]-Open[-3]) < 0.5*abs(Close[-4]-Open[-4])) and (Close[-3] > Close[-4]) and (Close[-2] < Open[-2]) and (Close[-2] < (Open[-4]+Close[-4])/2) and (Close[-1] < Open[-1]) and (Close[-1] < Low[-2])

triggers.name: Piercing Line
triggers.formula: (Close[-3] < Open[-3]) and (Open[-2] < Close[-3]) and (Close[-2] > (Open[-3]+Close[-3])/2) and (Close[-2] < Open[-3]) and (Close[-1] > Open[-1]) and (Close[-1] > High[-2])

triggers.name: Dark Cloud Cover
triggers.formula: (Close[-3] > Open[-3]) and (Open[-2] > Close[-3]) and (Close[-2] < (Open[-3]+Close[-3])/2) and (Close[-2] > Open[-3]) and (Close[-1] < Open[-1]) and (Close[-1] < Low[-2])

triggers.name: Spinning Top
triggers.formula: (abs(Close-Open) <= 0.4*(High-Low)) and ((High-max(Open,Close)) >= 0.5*abs(Close-Open)) and ((min(Open,Close)-Low) >= 0.5*abs(Close-Open))

triggers.name: Rising Three Methods
triggers.formula: (Close[-5]>Open[-5] and (Close[-5]-Open[-5])>0.6*(High[-5]-Low[-5])) and (High[-4]<=High[-5] and Low[-4]>=Low[-5] and abs(Close[-4]-Open[-4])<0.5*(Close[-5]-Open[-5])) and (High[-3]<=High[-5] and Low[-3]>=Low[-5] and abs(Close[-3]-Open[-3])<0.5*(Close[-5]-Open[-5])) and (High[-2]<=High[-5] and Low[-2]>=Low[-5] and abs(Close[-2]-Open[-2])<0.5*(Close[-5]-Open[-5])) and (Close[-1]>Open[-1] and Close[-1]>Close[-5])

triggers.name: Abandoned Baby
triggers.formula: abs(Close[-2]-Open[-2]) <= 0.1*(High[-2]-Low[-2]) and ((Close[-3]<Open[-3] and Close[-1]>Open[-1] and Close[-1]>High[-2] and Open[-1]>High[-2]) or (Close[-3]>Open[-3] and Close[-1]<Open[-1] and Close[-1]<Low[-2] and Open[-1]<Low[-2]))

triggers.name: Three Inside Up
triggers.formula: Close[-3]<Open[-3] and Close[-2]>Open[-2] and Open[-2]>=Close[-3] and Close[-2]<=Open[-3] and Close[-1]>Open[-1] and Close[-1]>Open[-3]

triggers.name: Three Inside Down
triggers.formula: Close[-3]>Open[-3] and Close[-2]<Open[-2] and Open[-2]<=Close[-3] and Close[-2]>=Open[-3] and Close[-1]<Open[-1] and Close[-1]<Open[-3]

triggers.name: Bullish Tasuki Gap
triggers.formula: Close[-3]>Open[-3] and Close[-2]<Open[-2] and Open[-2]>=Open[-3] and Open[-2]<=Close[-3] and Close[-2]>Open[-3] and Close[-1]>Open[-1] and Close[-1]>Close[-3]

triggers.name: Bearish Tasuki Gap
triggers.formula: Close[-3]<Open[-3] and Close[-2]>Open[-2] and Open[-2]<=Open[-3] and Open[-2]>=Close[-3] and Close[-2]<Open[-3] and Close[-1]<Open[-1] and Close[-1]<Close[-3]

triggers.name: Mat Hold
triggers.formula: (Close[-5]>Open[-5] and (Close[-5]-Open[-5])>0.6*(High[-5]-Low[-5])) and (abs(Close[-4]-Open[-4])<0.5*(Close[-5]-Open[-5])) and (abs(Close[-3]-Open[-3])<0.5*(Close[-5]-Open[-5])) and (abs(Close[-2]-Open[-2])<0.5*(Close[-5]-Open[-5])) and (Close[-1]>Open[-1] and Close[-1]>Close[-5])

triggers.name: Kicking
triggers.formula: abs(Close[-2]-Open[-2])>0 and (High[-2]-max(Open[-2],Close[-2])<=0.05*abs(Close[-2]-Open[-2])) and (min(Open[-2],Close[-2])-Low[-2]<=0.05*abs(Close[-2]-Open[-2])) and abs(Close[-1]-Open[-1])>0 and (High[-1]-max(Open[-1],Close[-1])<=0.05*abs(Close[-1]-Open[-1])) and (min(Open[-1],Close[-1])-Low[-1]<=0.05*abs(Close[-1]-Open[-1])) and ((Close[-2]>Open[-2] and Close[-1]<Open[-1]) or (Close[-2]<Open[-2] and Close[-1]>Open[-1])) and ((Close[-2]<Open[-2] and Open[-1]>High[-2]) or (Close[-2]>Open[-2] and Open[-1]<Low[-2]))

triggers.name: Three White Soldiers
triggers.formula: (Close[-3]>Open[-3] and (Close[-3]-Open[-3])>0.6*(High[-3]-Low[-3])) and (Close[-2]>Open[-2] and (Close[-2]-Open[-2])>0.6*(High[-2]-Low[-2]) and Open[-2]>=Open[-3] and Open[-2]<=Close[-3] and Close[-2]>Close[-3]) and (Close[-1]>Open[-1] and (Close[-1]-Open[-1])>0.6*(High[-1]-Low[-1]) and Open[-1]>=Open[-2] and Open[-1]<=Close[-2] and Close[-1]>Close[-2])

triggers.name: Three Black Crows
triggers.formula: (Close[-3]<Open[-3] and (Open[-3]-Close[-3])>0.6*(High[-3]-Low[-3])) and (Close[-2]<Open[-2] and (Open[-2]-Close[-2])>0.6*(High[-2]-Low[-2]) and Open[-2]<=Open[-3] and Open[-2]>=Close[-3] and Close[-2]<Close[-3]) and (Close[-1]<Open[-1] and (Open[-1]-Close[-1])>0.6*(High[-1]-Low[-1]) and Open[-1]<=Open[-2] and Open[-1]>=Close[-2] and Close[-1]<Close[-2])

triggers.name: Rising Window
triggers.formula: Close[-2]>Open[-2] and Close[-1]>Open[-1] and Low[-1]>High[-2]

triggers.name: Falling Window
triggers.formula: Close[-2]<Open[-2] and Close[-1]<Open[-1] and High[-1]<Low[-2]

triggers.name: Bullish Separating Lines
triggers.formula: Close[-2]>Open[-2] and Close[-1]>Open[-1] and abs(Open[-1]-Open[-2])<=0.05*(High[-2]-Low[-2]) and Close[-1]>Close[-2]

triggers.name: Bearish Separating Lines
triggers.formula: Close[-2]<Open[-2] and Close[-1]<Open[-1] and abs(Open[-1]-Open[-2])<=0.05*(High[-2]-Low[-2]) and Close[-1]<Close[-2]

triggers.name: Upside Gap Two Crows
triggers.formula: Close[-3]>Open[-3] and Close[-2]<Open[-2] and Open[-2]>Close[-3] and Close[-2]>Close[-3] and Close[-1]<Open[-1] and Open[-1]>Open[-2] and Close[-1]<Close[-2] and Close[-1]>Close[-3]

triggers.name: On Neck
triggers.formula: Close[-2]<Open[-2] and Close[-1]>Open[-1] and Open[-1]<Close[-2] and abs(Close[-1]-Close[-2])<=0.1*(High[-2]-Low[-2])

triggers.name: In Neck
triggers.formula: Close[-2]<Open[-2] and Close[-1]>Open[-1] and Open[-1]<Close[-2] and Close[-1]>Close[-2] and Close[-1]<Open[-2]

triggers.name: Thrusting
triggers.formula: Close[-2]<Open[-2] and Close[-1]>Open[-1] and Open[-1]<Close[-2] and Close[-1]>((Open[-2]+Close[-2])/2) and Close[-1]<Open[-2]

triggers.name: Deliberation
triggers.formula: Close[-3]>Open[-3] and (Close[-3]-Open[-3])*0.6<(Close[-2]-Open[-2]) and Close[-1]>Open[-1] and Close[-1]>Close[-2] and Close[-1]-Open[-1]<0.5*(Close[-2]-Open[-2]) and abs(Close[-1]-Close[-2])<=0.1*(High[-2]-Low[-2])
